metadata.title: Endbefundbericht Stoffwechsellabor
metadata.author: Dr. med. Mirjam Schweitzer-Martin
metadata.summary: This is a metabolic laboratory report from UniversitätsKlinikum Heidelberg for patient Valerie Lemken (born 22.09.2020), detailing urine organic acid analysis. Results show markedly elevated levels of Succinate, Uracil, Dihydrouracil, and 2-OH-Glutarate, suggesting possible bacterial contamination or mitochondrial energy metabolism disorder. The report recommends follow-up testing with preserved urine samples and precise quantification via isotope dilution.
